ch0121_00_plumeria/0101_0701_01_10:
Hm? Oh, it’s you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
You sure come around a lot.
ch0121_00_plumeria/0101_0701_02_10:
Not that I hate that or anything. I’m looking
forward to seeing what kind of trouble you cause.
ch0121_00_plumeria/0601_0701_01_10:
I’ve been walking around town a lot since I got
to Pasio.
ch0121_00_plumeria/0601_0701_02_10:
When I walk around in Alola looking like this,
people get scared of me.
ch0121_00_plumeria/0601_0701_03_10:
That doesn’t happen as much here. It’s a pretty
refreshing feeling.
ch0121_00_plumeria/0601_0702_01_10:
Before, I’d always have to do annoying work, like
dealing with whatever dumb thing the Grunts did.
ch0121_00_plumeria/0601_0702_02_10:
I never had a moment to myself, but now I’ve got
a ton of time to enjoy doing whatever I want.
ch0121_00_plumeria/0601_0702_03_10:
I wonder how those numskulls are doing... It’s not
like I’m really worried or anything.
ch0121_00_plumeria/0602_0701_01_10:
The poisonous gas my partner Pokémon Salazzle
releases can be used to make perfume.
ch0121_00_plumeria/0602_0701_02_10:
As it is, it’s dangerous, but if you dilute it, it
becomes a great-smelling perfume.
ch0121_00_plumeria/0602_0701_03_10:
Hm? What kind of scent does it have? You’re too
young to be interested in things like that.
ch0121_00_plumeria/0602_0702_01_10:
You think it’s weird that a Poison-type Pokémon
can make perfume? That’s what’s so interesting
about Salazzle.
ch0121_00_plumeria/0602_0702_02_10:
Everyone being different is what makes things
interesting. That’s true for people and Pokémon.
ch0121_00_plumeria/0603_0701_01_10:
There’s a proper strategy for every Pokémon
in battle.
ch0121_00_plumeria/0603_0701_02_10:
For example, being poisoned slowly drains a
Pokémon of its energy.
ch0121_00_plumeria/0603_0701_03_10:
There’s more to battling than just using brainless
force. Battling with your head is good, too.
ch0121_00_plumeria/0603_0702_01_10:
You battle pretty well. It’s impressive.
Kind of dignified.
ch0121_00_plumeria/0603_0702_02_10:
I’m looking forward to seeing what kind of
Trainer you become.
ch0121_00_plumeria/0604_0701_01_10:
The guys in Team Skull just don’t know how to live
their lives. Just dummies doing dumb things.
ch0121_00_plumeria/0604_0701_02_10:
They’ve just wandered and gotten a little bit
lost for a time, is all.
ch0121_00_plumeria/0604_0701_03_10:
It’s my duty to protect them and keep them on
the right path.
ch0121_00_plumeria/0604_0702_01_10:
Don’t know if that really makes me a leader or
whatever, though.
ch0121_00_plumeria/0604_0702_02_10:
I think it’s more that I’m just nice enough to keep
Team Skull together so they don’t go off on their
own and do anything stupid.
ch0121_00_plumeria/0605_0701_01_10: Team Skull’s completely full of idiots.
ch0121_00_plumeria/0605_0701_02_10:
But don’t you think some dummies are cute in
their dumbness?
ch0121_00_plumeria/0605_0701_03_10: For some reason, I just can’t abandon those guys.
ch0121_00_plumeria/0605_0702_01_10:
You seemed pretty boring when we first met,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0121_00_plumeria/0605_0702_02_10:
But it turns out you’re strong and you’ve got some
serious guts.
ch0121_00_plumeria/0605_0702_03_10:
Don’t get the wrong idea—mess with anyone
in Team Skull, and I’ll show you how serious I 
can get.
ch0121_00_plumeria/1701_0701_01_10: Here. Shut up and take this.
ch0121_00_plumeria/1701_0701_02_10: It could be useful, though that depends on you.
ch0121_00_plumeria/1701_0702_01_10:
You’re free to choose how you use it. Do what
you want.
ch0121_00_plumeria/2501_0701_01_10: Pasio’s towns sure have a lot of different shops.
ch0121_00_plumeria/2501_0701_02_10:
I’m really interested in the makeup and plushies
you can’t find around Alola.
ch0121_00_plumeria/2501_0701_03_10:
What? Got a problem with me being into that
kind of stuff?
ch0121_00_plumeria/2501_0702_01_10:
I’ve got quite a bit of stuff like that back in my
room at Team Skull’s base.
ch0121_00_plumeria/2501_0702_02_10:
Adding the things I buy on Pasio to that collection
sounds like fun.
ch0121_00_plumeria/2501_0702_03_10: Come shopping with me next time.
ch0121_00_plumeria/2511_0701_01_10:
A long time ago, someone in town tried to pick a
fight with me.
ch0121_00_plumeria/2511_0701_02_10:
Another person saved me by challenging them to a
Pokémon battle.
ch0121_00_plumeria/2511_0702_01_10:
Pain, failure—it’s not easy when things don’t go
the way you’d like.
ch0121_00_plumeria/2511_0702_02_10:
I don’t think I’d admire that person as much as I do
if they were strong and nothing else.
ch0121_00_plumeria/3001_0701_01_10:
Oh... Sorry, kinda busy right now. I’ve pretty much
dedicated my whole day to cleaning up my room.
ch0121_00_plumeria/3002_0701_01_10:
When I see numskulls slacking off first thing in
the morning, it’s hard not to go over and
straighten ’em out!
ch0121_00_plumeria/3003_0701_01_10:
I think my Pokémon’s really starting to like this
place... I guess it’s growing on me, too.
ch0121_00_plumeria/3004_0701_01_10:
The quickest way to get stronger is to train with
your Pokémon every day—no excuses.
ch0121_00_plumeria/3005_0701_01_10:
Hm? You wanna go sightseeing? That’s cool. I just
prefer to laze around in the afternoon, personally.
ch0121_00_plumeria/3006_0701_01_10:
Not sure if I approve of you walking around at
night... Holler at me if anything spooks you,
all right?
